dct_title_s: Six ethnographical maps, illustrative of "The natural history of man," and "Researches into the physical history of mankind." By James Cowles Prichard. [Map III: Africa]
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. No. t.-p.; title supplied from label. Each map has title: Ethnographical map ... illustrative of Dr. Prichard's Natural history of man. And his Researches into the physical history of mankind. 2d. ed. 1851. Imprint at foot of each map as above. Text: 3 p. (44 x 28 cm)
